name: trip
description: Trip is a self-hosted trip planning and travel log application. It helps organize itineraries, notes, and expenses for journeys, offering a convenient web UI for planning and documentation.
features: Itinerary planning: Plan trip itineraries with activities, accommodations, and transportation details.
Travel notes: Document travel experiences with notes, photos, and memories for each trip.
Expense tracking: Track trip expenses by category to understand costs and stay within budget.
Destination management: Organize trips by destination with maps and location information.
Activity scheduling: Schedule activities and events with dates and times for organized travel.
Packing lists: Create and manage packing lists to ensure you don't forget essential items.
Document storage: Store travel documents like tickets, reservations, and confirmations in one place.
Trip sharing: Share trip plans with travel companions for collaborative planning.
Budget planning: Set trip budgets and monitor spending to avoid overspending.
Photo organization: Attach photos to trips and activities for visual travel documentation.
Mobile access: Plan and document trips from mobile devices with a responsive interface.
Privacy-focused: Keep all travel data on your own server with complete control.
